title: Trying to post, not sure how this works.
body: I'm level 5 in the game, some boards say they only need level 1, but the Help & Support Board is still the only one I can post to.  Do I somehow need to level up in the boards?  How do I do that?

replies.body:
You gain levels on the boards for every dank meme you post, so I recommend posting moar memes in order to level up. 

http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/ktpng.gif

**Just kidding!** Sometimes your boards and summoner profiles fall out of sync if you haven't posted in a while. It seems they've synced now since you show up here as level 5. Let me know if you have any questions.
